content: **sign up for my mailing list at https //view flodesk com/pages/63d4ba29de520bd60dc33f80** -the premium printable pdf of the pattern can be found here 1 -pattern is available in english only in us terminology -you will need jumbo size 7 yarn in any color of your choice here i m using sweet snuggles in red white and blue *each star uses up less than 1 skein of yarn* -pattern is beginner friendly it is recommended that you are familiar with the basic stitches -follow me on instagram @curiouspapaya for the latest updates 1 https //curiouspapaya com/products/giant-star-crochet-pattern
